result.execSummary:
The defendant DYLAN J. HEISER was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Stalking [Modifiers: Repeater], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.32(2).
  • Sex Offender-Fail/Update Information, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 301.45(4)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Defendant is not eligible for either the Substance Abuse Program or the Challenge Incarceration Program.  See below for credit for time served.
Concurrent with: Concurrent with Count 2.  Consecutive to any other sentence.

superMiscConds.notes: The Court ordered that all court costs, fines, and surcharges be paid through collection by the Department of Corrections from 25% of funds under Sec. 973.05(4)(b) and as a condition of extended supervision.   Penalty for non-payment shall be entry of civil judgment.   Clerk of Courts shall docket without fees.  Send payments to:  Clerk of Courts, Room 110, 415 Jackson Street, P O Box 2808, Oshkosh WI  54903-2808.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: 9:36 AM Defendant DYLAN J. HEISER in court with attorney Morgan Rae.  Defendant DYLAN J. HEISER in custody.  Anthony Prekop appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant advised of and waives rights.  Offer entered onto court record.  Defendant free to argue. Enters plea freely and voluntarily and proceeds to sentencing.  Victim/Witness rights complied with.  Parties waive right to Pre-Sentence Investigation.
Plea/sentencing hearing on May 10, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Plea hearing on May 19, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant DYLAN J. HEISER in court with attorney Morgan Rae.  Defendant DYLAN J. HEISER in custody.  Nerrissa L Dyett appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Adjournment requested.  Plea hearing scheduled for May 19, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant appears in custody via ZOOM video with Atty. Morgan Rae.  State appears by ADA Anthony Prekop.  Information filed - reading waived.  Bond continues.
Defendant waives right to Preliminary Hearing.  Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed.  Defendant bound over for trial.

HEISER appeared by video means with Attorney.  The Court notes there is no victim present that wishes to make a statement.  Bond continues.   Record closed @ 9:23  Arraignment scheduled for February 21, 2022 at 08:15 am.
